metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: • In a blender, combine frozen berries, spinach, Greek yogurt, almond milk, and honey

• Ingredients: o 2 red bell peppers o 1/2 cup walnuts o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 tablespoon pomegranate molasses o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon salt • Instructions: o Roast bell peppers until charred, then peel and seed o Blend peppers, walnuts, breadcrumbs, minced garlic, olive oil, pomegranate molasses, cumin, and salt in a food processor until smooth

• Ingredients: o 2 red bell peppers o 1/2 cup walnuts o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 tablespoon pomegranate molasses o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon salt • Instructions: o Roast bell peppers until charred, then peel and seed o Blend peppers, walnuts, breadcrumbs, minced garlic, olive oil, pomegranate molasses, cumin, and salt in a food processor until smooth o Serve with pita bread

• Ingredients: o 1 can chickpeas o 1/4 cup tahini o 1/4 cup lemon juice o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 teaspoon salt • Instructions: o Drain and rinse chickpeas o Blend chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor

• Ingredients: o 1 can chickpeas o 1/4 cup tahini o 1/4 cup lemon juice o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 teaspoon salt • Instructions: o Drain and rinse chickpeas o Blend chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor o Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth o Serve with a drizzle of olive oil

• Ingredients: o 2 eggplants o 1/4 cup tahini o 1/4 cup lemon juice o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 teaspoon salt • Instructions: o Roast eggplants until soft, then peel and mash o Blend mashed eggplant, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor

• Ingredients: o 2 eggplants o 1/4 cup tahini o 1/4 cup lemon juice o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 teaspoon salt • Instructions: o Roast eggplants until soft, then peel and mash o Blend mashed eggplant, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor o Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth o Serve with a drizzle of olive oil

• Ingredients: o 1 can chickpeas o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup parsley o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon coriander o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/4 cup flour o Oil for frying • Instructions: o Drain and rinse chickpeas o Blend chickpeas, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped parsley, cumin, coriander, and salt in a food processor o Form mixture into balls and fry in hot oil until golden

• Ingredients: o 1 can chickpeas o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup parsley o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon coriander o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/4 cup flour o Oil for frying • Instructions: o Drain and rinse chickpeas o Blend chickpeas, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped parsley, cumin, coriander, and salt in a food processor o Add flour and mix until combined o Form mixture into balls and fry in hot oil until golden
